#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int fact(int n)
{
	int result=1,j=1;
	for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
		result*=j;
	return result;	
}

int main() {
	int n,m,h;
	scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&h);
	int s[m],i=0,sum=0;
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&s[i]);
		sum+=s[i];
	}
	if(sum<n)
		printf("-1");
	int x=sum-s[h-1];
	int y=n-1;
	//printf("%d %d",x,y);
	if((x-y)<0)
		printf("1");
	else
		printf("%0.6f",1-(fact(x)/(fact(x-y)*fact(y))));
	//printf("%d",fact(x));
	//printf("%d ",fact(x-y));
	//printf("%d ",fact(y));
	return 0;
}
